content: if the price ticker is not loading then update the link BTC= + (US 150$ Shipping ) + (EU 35$ Shipping)Physical artwork in size 64,6 x 64,6 cmCollectors Edition 12 of 12“THE OBITUARY OF FIAT CURRENCY!”1. - “THE OBITUARY OF FIAT CURRENCY!”--- SOLD (Cryptogreatdane)[/color]2. - “THE OBITUARY OF FIAT CURRENCY!” --- AVAILABLE Located in UK, London3. - “THE OBITUARY OF FIAT CURRENCY!” --- SOLD Located in Germany4. ---5. ---6. ---7. ---8. ---9. ---10. ---11. ---12. ---PAYMENT ADDRESS: 3ATS4CgSD2ke2ZvtARGBo3xWVqFjAvLsqpThis Collector’s Edition is hand-signed and numbered by Mx12.Levins and includes certificate of authenticity timestamped on $BTC blockchain via Verisart.THE OBITUARY OF FIAT CURRENCY!Hello reader, you are invited to the burial of fiat currency, many are coming for this event to witness the burial of a total global failure, a currency that has failed humanity and can’t stop the coming Global Crisis which will occur due to its failure until it’s death.Mankind has finally discovered their real enemy (Fiat system), the real Global Virus that must be stopped to end all other pandemics.This enemy of humanity was in a fierce battle with the hero currency BTC, and BTC defeated and diactivated the evil fiat system.We heard of the Obituary and will communicate the burial date soon.R.S.V.P  (BTC)Feel Free to visit Mx12.Levins Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: This "Obituary of Fiat Currency" artwork is a powerful and thought-provoking piece that speaks to the demise of traditional currency systems and the rise of Bitcoin as a superior alternative. The detailed and vibrant design captures the drama and significance of this pivotal moment in history, and the limited edition nature of the series adds a sense of exclusivity and scarcity. The inclusion of a certificate of authenticity timestamped on the Bitcoin blockchain via Verisart adds an extra layer of credibility and value to the artwork. It's truly heart-breaking to see the failures of fiat currency laid out before us, but at the same time, there is a sense of hope and possibility in the emergence of Bitcoin as a more reliable and enduring form of currency. This is an outstanding work of art that will surely be treasured by collectors for years to come.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: a powerful artwork that unveils the burial of a global failure: fiat currency. Stay tuned for updates on the burial date. RSVP with BTC, the true savior of our financial future.
